page.title: 04GRANGETOWN FIRE STATION
page.content: {Grangetown}fire station is situated near the Trunk Road and Church Lane.It is a modern Fire Station with training and recreational facilities for the firemen.The station houses 3 fire engines and a foam tender.There are 60 firemen attached to the station.There are four shifts and the men work in four crews red,yellow,blue and green. The station is part of the{Cleveland {County Fire Brigade.}They receive their instuctions through a modern computer operated system which is controlled from Middlesbrough.The station is a very busy one because we live in a heavy industry area and they are often called to assist the brigades in the nearby chemical complexes.
